text: Kare wa itta. `Anata gata no omo no chōbatsu to o ikari wa, sudeni anata gata ni kudatte iru. Anata gata to, anata gata no sosen ga meimei shita (gūzō no)-mei ni tsuite, arrā ga nani no ken'i o mo sadzuke rarenai mono ni tsuite, anata gata wa watashi to ronsō suru no ka. Sorenara mate. Hontōni watashi mo, anata gata to tomoni matte iru monodearu
